abstract: Monday marked the return of new episodes of “House” after a 12-week hiatus, and the show lifted Fox to first place in the important demographic of adults 18 to 49. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the medical drama led the night in that age group, while drawing 14.5 million total viewers during the 9 p.m. hour.
lead_paragraph: Monday marked the return of new episodes of “House” after a 12-week hiatus, and the show lifted Fox to first place in the important demographic of adults 18 to 49. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the medical drama led the night in that age group, while drawing 14.5 million total viewers during the 9 p.m. hour.

headline.main: Dr. House Gives Fox a Ratings Lift
